lead_paragraph: In addition to isolation, new genetic information suggested that inbreeding also played a role in their demise.

headline.print_headline: Last Mammoths Spent Final Years on Solitary Island
headline.main: Last Mammoths Spent Final Years on Solitary Island

snippet: In addition to isolation, new genetic information suggested that inbreeding also played a role in their demise.
abstract: Dr Love Dalen study published online in Current Biology reports that researchers have sequenced DNA of woolly mammoth and have determined that species most likely died out on an isolated island from inbreeding.
